name: Cool STD Crisis
description:
A little bit of Asteroids (quite a lot, actually), a little bit of Dr. Mario, some absurd background straight out of Fantastic Voyage, and a ridiculous title to top it off.

Cool STD Crisis is a short retro inspired arcade shooter, where you take control of a miniaturized ship sent into a human body dealing with 2 infections at once. Kill viruses and bacteria by shooting them with the appropriate drug and try to survive in the process.


Controls

Keyboard ⌨️

Rotate shipLeft Arrow, Right ArrowAccelerate shipUp ArrowShoot antiviralZShoot antibioticX
